entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 40 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Friday 7 April 2023
